field.p: No orders to upsell found.
An order is to upsell when delivered quantities are above initially ordered quantities, && the invoicing policy is based on ordered quantities.
As an example, if you sell pre-paid hours of services, Verp recommends you to sell extra hours when all ordered hours have been consumed.

record.field: This report performs analysis on your quotations. Analysis check your sales revenues && sort it by different group criteria (salesman, partner, product, etc.) Use this report to perform analysis on sales not having invoiced yet. If you want to analyse your turnover, you should use the Invoice Analysis report in the Accounting application.

This report performs analysis on your sales orders. Analysis check your sales revenues && sort it by different group criteria (salesman, partner, product, etc.) Use this report to perform analysis on sales not having invoiced yet. If you want to analyse your turnover, you should use the Invoice Analysis report in the Accounting application.
From this report, you can have an overview of the amount invoiced to your customer. The search tool can also be used to personalise your Invoices reports && so, match this analysis to your needs.
